hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path to #the Tower#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #giant pot in the Shadow Temple# holds #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that in #Goron City# the hammer unlocks #a Blue Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##the Spirit Temple## has #7# major items.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Bombs (5 pieces)# can be found in #the Thieves' Hideout#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Bongo Bongo# holds...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path of #time#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Near Four Armos Chest

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #a Map# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #an Ice Trap# can be found at #Zora's River#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Game Key#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a #generic grotto#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: You would be surprised at all the things you can Hookshot in the Spirit Temple!

LH (Lab).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #4# major items.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Wallet#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: Gorons are stupid. They eat rocks. Except, apparently, the big rock blocking Dodongo's Cavern.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Wallet#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

ToT (Right).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the Zora's Domain #diving game and torch run# lead to...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #a Purple Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #the Song of Time#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly GS Water Switch Room

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #3# major items.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Nocturne of Shadow#.
